website_summaries.verdict: The Epson VS340 XGA 3LCD Data Projector is a capable budget model that provides portability, solid data- and video-image quality, and a good selection of ports.
pros: Good range of ports for a budget projector

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector!!
customer_reviews.text: I *LOVE* this projector! I've used it for various lessons and workshop presentations in small and large spaces. The picture is bright and the clarity is great. A colleague of mine uses a bigger, bulkier Epson model (which I've also used on numerous occasions before purchasing this one), and I find that this smaller, lighter model does the job just as well, but is more portable for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice projector. I was a little worried about the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice projector. I was a little worried about the picture just because I wanted the WXGA rather then the XGA. But when I received it I open it up and plugged it in and the picture was beautiful with very vivid colors and it was the middle of the day. I have used it outside for outdoor movie nights and it's great. Love this projector!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The resolution is great enough to view Power Point slides and movies
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely worth the $400. I bought cheaper one prior to this one, but it is night and day difference. It is bright - I can see the screen (picture, letter, etc.) during the day time without no problems. The resolution is great enough to view Power Point slides and movies. So far it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Won Sim

customer_reviews.title: Great for movie night in the back yard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector for movies outside and indoors (even in the day time). My only negative is that the volume sucks and there is no audio output, but I knew that from the other reviews prior to purchasing. I ended up just using a bluetooth speaker that I hook up to my device that is plugged into the projectyor
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: A Great Projector at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: We use this projector both indoors and out. The image is bright and clear. We use it for movie nights in the backyard paired with a Bluetooth speaker. We have also used it for football games on our textured cream colored walls with excellent results. For the money, it is an exceptional value. So glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Pflum

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the seminary I work for. The old one was not so bright or clear, the lights needed to be turned off which was a major distraction for the class and professors. The new Epson VS350 XGA with 3,300 lumens, the lights stay on, the letters are not fuzzy completely readable and clear.
customer_reviews.author: uts library

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing discovery.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and immediately I see a VGA to VGA cable is included. This product is advertised repeatedly in the ad as an HDMI projector. It should have an HDMI cable. I'm at the presentation with my laptop, which only has an HDMI output. So this projector is of no value to me today. What a miss for Epson. I'll update my review when I can get this projector functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use it at home for watching movies. The resolution is good. The contrast is not very high. Blacks are lit too much (which you get often as it is not a wide aspect ratio image). It is not loud. But it does get pretty hot. This is my first proper projector, so I am enjoying it regardless of the imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector..thumbs up 👍🤗
customer_reviews.text: One of the best i had owned recommend ..We use it every week in our Bible studies and no regrets.. i read some ppl takes about noise I tell you for my experience i do not hear any. So far so good.. we have like for a year havent had any problem.. buy it..
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: It's also super easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional projector. Even in bright lights you can see the image clarity very well, especially compared to standard projectors. It's also super easy to setup. I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Projector
customer_reviews.text: Very good projector, picture is very crisp. Not perfect for how we are using it due to the fact that the brightness illuminates the whole room, but that problem is specific to how we are using it. Only real issue is that it has a "Sleep Timer" that does not work
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: We primarily use Macs with this and we can't get ...
customer_reviews.text: We primarily use Macs with this and we can't get the VGA connection to work so we use the USB connector instead but that requires a download before the first use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play, easy to use out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Audio quality for videos and presentations is decent for average sized conference rooms. Picture quality is great even when projection on a simple white wall. Picture quality is decent even in a dimmed light room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great projector!!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, travel friendly, easy to use, clear quality. I used this for presenting dinner seminars in a banquet room with dimmed lighting. It worked perfectly. I also recommend using a PPT clicker!
customer_reviews.author: naomi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Projector
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a projector for our annual board meeting that would allow viewers to see the presentation without having to dim the lights. This projector did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Tad Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Epson VS350
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful projector. I am a professional installer and will recommend this to anyone. Very high resolution and bright vivid colors. This was used in a church install. 4’ drop from the ceiling, 18’ from projection screen at 120” projected distance.
customer_reviews.author: DSpade77

customer_reviews.title: A great projector for the price!
customer_reviews.text: A great projector for the price! We use it in our Toastmasters club for presentations that accompany speeches. Has all the basics for beautiful presentations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Projector
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector, my wife is a teacher and it worked well for her presentations and home movies. It's not really suited for small rooms and you will need to attach external speakers but it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: xavier

customer_reviews.title: Colorful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector. I give presentations to small groups and the picture is very clear and crisp. Easy to use. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: thinkmom5252613

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice produce. Works well and easy to use. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roc

customer_reviews.title: It heats up a lot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector, good image quality but it heats up a lot.
customer_reviews.author: LAURO LENIN MACAS BLACIO

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Nothing to get excited about
customer_reviews.text: Used it once for a presentation. May use it again in a year. Nothing to brag about. Wish I had got something better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The picture is great!! SO glad we bought it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to watch outdoor movies and have been very impressed. The picture is great!! SO glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMeg

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive projector for presentations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this projector to do presentations at different venues. Resolution was not a top priority but brightness was. Nice bright picture even with a lot of ambient light. Fast on and off. Lightweight. Works great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for professional presentations. Best value for the money I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Osoliniec

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect and worked great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this projector last March and only used it for one presentation. Easy to connect and worked great. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Clear image. Easy to operate. Epson quality. Love it. My only complaint is the lack of a protective case.
customer_reviews.author: Don Sturgill

customer_reviews.title: Just love this projector
customer_reviews.text: Just love this projector. The quality you will get is not comparable to all the cheaper ones here at amazon. You have several options to adjust the perfect viewing on your projection screen.
customer_reviews.author: AmanteNJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great really happy , use outdoors in the daylight and still easy to see very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just gets a little too hot
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. I use it for teaching - had a nice range and large, clear picture. Only drawback is that it gets a bit too hot after 90 min so so. I wouldn't want to use it longer than 2 hours without turning it off to cool down.
customer_reviews.author: ASGJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great brightness, color rendition and color saturation. Simple to use. Lots of inputs and outputs.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Serafini

customer_reviews.title: AV for Work Presentations
customer_reviews.text: Great AV equipment with quality picture. Will have to send an update after several times of usage.
customer_reviews.author: SEC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good clear picture
customer_reviews.text: Thus far this projector is exceeding expectations. Simple to setup and use. Good clear picture. A value at this price point. I would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hugs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality image
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and adjust! Picture quality is excellent!!!! Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Petrichko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I hoped it would be. It will serve its purpose for my Halloween video setup.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my class!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful projector. Easy to set up, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Randi L Davis

customer_reviews.title: I'm certain the more money you spend the better resolution, but this is an amazing projector at ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm certain the more money you spend the better resolution, but this is an amazing projector at a very reasonable price! I use it to teach workshops and computer applications. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Sass

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Teacher!
customer_reviews.text: It is bright enough to use with my classroom lights on! Excellent clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Projects as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice projector, although not self focusing...would try to find that option when buying again.
customer_reviews.author: CJ M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector For The Price! Home Entertainment at its Best!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally bright and clear picture! Easy to use, set up and store. We use it out on our covered deck for evening movies and sporting events. The HDMI input works with our portable blu-Ray player for awesome home movie viewing or plugs into our Directv receiver for live tv or high definition football! The only downside is the internal speaker doesn't put out much sound, so we hook up a small pair of powered computer speakers for a bit more "oomph"! We haven't been to a movie theater in the last few months, because it's cheaper, easier and more comfortable to watch movies at home using this awesome Epson projector!
customer_reviews.author: Fantasy Frodo

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice projector. I use it as a presentation tool ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice projector. I use it as a presentation tool and the text and pictures are sharp and clear. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tecora

customer_reviews.title: clear picture and works great with our videos and powerpoints
customer_reviews.text: it works perfectly in our room. clear picture and works great with our videos and powerpoints.
customer_reviews.author: somebody

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Bought two and mounted them side by side to project a great image.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good projector with good price. Resolution is much better than 800x600 projectors.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: but the instructions with the projector are skimpy at best. The online troubleshooting was too complicated to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Used the HDMI connection to make a power point presentation. It works OK, but trying to use this projector for a slideshow using pictures has proved fruitless. It is probably something to do with settings on my laptop, but the instructions with the projector are skimpy at best. The online troubleshooting was too complicated to be of any assistance. Instructions for which or when to connect various types of cables to the projector are confusing. Definitely not for the IT challenged user.
customer_reviews.author: jdssr

customer_reviews.title: it's great. The picture quality is great
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it's great. The picture quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: M Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Has all the features needed for an office projector. We use it for presentations and watching videos with a Google Chromecast connected.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this thing is great, bright as day in a super bright florescent lit room
customer_reviews.author: Bradley A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright. Can be used during the day with some moderate ambient light. Menus are intuitive and manual adjustments are easy. I think it even has a gyro that automatically adjusts for changing the projection angle.
customer_reviews.author: MehSaurus

customer_reviews.title: This projector has worked great since installing
customer_reviews.text: This projector has worked great since installing. It gets used a couple of hours each week. It is bright, but the image is smaller than the one it replaced and there is not a convenient way to remount it.
customer_reviews.author: A Snider

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with projector - just make sure you have correct cables.
customer_reviews.text: Works great - just make sure you have the correct cables and its pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several of these projectors to use for training at a trade show. The projectors connected easily to all of our laptops, we used both the VGA & HDMI adapters and they looked great! We used them for two full days without any overheating issues. The units are small and survived the trip very well.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS I GOMEZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Small buisness and Home.
customer_reviews.text: Use this in one of my conference rooms for my small business and works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Brett M.

customer_reviews.title: Can't use for my power points presentations.
customer_reviews.text: The image is great, but it seems to be that i can't use it for my power points presentations without a USB-B cable and this sucks since most of projectors can do this with out the need of pluggin an extra cable besides the HDMI or VGA. NOT COOL.
customer_reviews.author: Jhonathan de los Santos

product_meta.title: Epson VS340 XGA 3LCD Projector 2800 Lumens Color Brightness
product_meta.description: Style:VS3402800 lumens color brightness and 2800 lumens white brightness. Fast setup; HDMI connectivity.
feature_bullets: Look for two numbers: 2800 lumens Color Brightness for more accurate, vivid color2800 lumens White Brightness for well-lit rooms.Including feet:11.7" x 9.2" x 3.2" (W x D x H),Excluding feet:11.7" x 9.2" x 3.0" (W x D x H)
XGA resolution (1024 x 768) - 1.5x more resolution than SVGA for projecting advanced presentations with text-heavy charts and spreadsheets
Fast, easy setup, only from Epson - get up and running in no time with easy image adjustments and convenient control
Compatible with the latest laptops and media players - supports HDMI, the standard in connectivity, for digital video and audio with just one cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars167 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
